responses.gpt4: I'm sorry, Ms. Aguirre, I didn't hear you clearly. Could you please repeat your response?
responses.our_model: Thank you, Ms. Aguirre. One way to manage blood pressure is by reducing sodium intake. This can be achieved by eating less processed foods and adding less salt to your meals. What do you think about this suggestion?
